overview: Men are on the prowl ... wandering the dark alleys, the bookstore backrooms and shadowy bars. They're everywhere: a house-painter with a bulge in his Levis; a straying lover looking for hot sex with no-strings attached. These are just a few of the horny guys using whatever handy subterfuge to look for big dicks to suck and tight asses to fuck. All they want is to get their rocks off and just walk away.
title: Smoke Screen
